arts.ttl: Key Barcelona defender receives medical clearance ahead of PSG clash
arts.sum: In a recent update provided by SPORT, it has come to light that Alejandro Balde has been given the green light to return just in time for their Champions League clash with Paris Saint-Germain. Notably, the left-back has been training with the squad for the past few days, but Hansi Flick chose not to risk […] The post Key Barcelona defender receives medical clearance ahead of PSG clash appeared first on Barca Universal.
